## SimulationEventPayloads."SIMULATION.DEBUG\_RENDER" property

Emitted when the simulation debug rendering is enabled.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[SimulationEvent.DEBUG_RENDER]: {
        simulation: Simulation;
        vertices: Float32Array;
        colors: Float32Array;
    };
```
